## Request

of tags associated with the variable"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"placeholder"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The content of the variable, which can be text, HTML, or a base64 encoded string for images"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"mimeType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The type of content that the variable holds, which can be `text`, `html`, or `image`"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allowRichTextInjection"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"Used in other parts of the API, this specifies if this variable can be used in Rich Text Injection. For knowledgebase/folders, it is best practice to leave this set to true"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"isGlobal"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","description":"A flag indicating whether the variable is global (i.e., part of the Knowledgebase). If true, the variable is available across all templates and templateFolderId should not be provided. This field is required if templateFolderId is not provided"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
